repo.name: bibtool
repo.description: BibTool is a tool for manipulating BibTeX data bases. BibTeX provides a mean to integrate citations into LaTeX documents. BibTool allows the manipulation of BibTeX files which goes beyond the possibilities -- and intentions -- of BibTeX.

readme.summary: Clear explanation of purpose and features but lacks practical installation steps, usage examples, and any troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No quick start or basic usage examples - users must read 80+ pages of LaTeX documentation to learn how to actually use the tool

security.summary: The code appears to be generally secure, but lacks input validation and has some potential issues with error handling and default configurations.

common_complaints: 74% of tests failing with no resolution
Build system limitations (in-source builds only, no VPATH support)
Compiler compatibility issues (GCC 15 regex compilation failures)
Missing or unclear documentation (syntax validation, rewrite rules)
Field handling bugs (newlines in annotate field discarded)
Case sensitivity issues with reference keys
sentiment.summary: The bib-tool project shows signs of abandonment with a critical 74% test failure rate, unresolved compiler compatibility issues, and slow/absent maintainer responses to fundamental build system and functionality problems spanning years.

red_flags: Some responses are vague and do not provide clear solutions
There is a lack of direct, actionable advice in many cases
communication.summary: The maintainer's responses are generally adequate but could be more helpful and clearer to new contributors.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being from September 2025
27 open issues with no recent activity
Zero closed issues in past 6 months
No merged pull requests in past 6 months
No active contributors in past 6 months
Stalled development with unresolved issue backlog
maintenance.summary: The project appears abandoned with no maintenance activity, no issue resolution, and a growing backlog of unresolved issues.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is thorough but lacks a clear quick start guide and troubleshooting section, making it difficult for new users to get started quickly.
concerns: No commits in the past six months, indicating a lack of recent development activity.
Last release was over two years ago.
Docs: Lack of a concise quick start example and troubleshooting guide
Community: compilation issues with newer GCC versions
Community: whitespace inconsistencies in test outputs
Communication: Some responses are vague and do not provide clear solutions
Communication: There is a lack of direct, actionable advice in many cases
High bus factor risk (99% from top contributor)
highlights: One contributor has been active in the past six months, suggesting some level of ongoing interest or need for maintenance.
